title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax incentives for investing in companies involved in space-related activities.
content: Zero Gravity, Zero Tax Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income: (1) space-related income. And (2) gain on the sale or exchange of any stock of a qualified space corporation. Establishes a space company investment credit for the purchase of qualified stock in a qualified space company.
